_description: TOWN-LEVEL SETTINGS: This is the main configuration for all Gas Town agents
_default_agent_comment: The default agent to use when a role doesn't have a specific assignment
_agents_comment: Define all available AI agents here. Each agent specifies the command, model, and environment

Kimi K2.5._comment: Example OpenCode agent with Kimi K2.5 model and full permissions

claude-sonnet._comment: Native Claude CLI with Sonnet model

claude-opus._comment: Native Claude CLI with Opus model (for complex tasks)

_role_agents_comment: Map each Gas Town role to an agent from the 'agents' section above

role_agents._deacon_comment: Deacons handle complex orchestration - use strongest model
role_agents._mayor_comment: Mayor coordinates entire towns - use strongest model
role_agents._polecat_comment: Polecats do most of the work - balanced cost/performance
role_agents._refinery_comment: Refinery processes code - needs good coding ability
role_agents._witness_comment: Witness monitors health - can use lighter model

_gastown_src_comment: Optional: Override the Gas Town source directory (usually auto-detected)
